description:
This course was designed as a simple toolbox of information and ideas. Parents with busy schedules will enjoy short lessons and exercises as well as simple, straightforward advice about topics such as TV, outdoor play and the many ways in which children learn. This is a quick and "dirty" look at what you can be doing, every day, to spend quality time learning with your young child.

There will be no guilt-ing, Mommy Wars or any other such nonsense. I am here to help you to help your child. So, let's get to it!
title: Learning and Growing Alongside your Young Child
